13};
14

26
27inline bool operator==(const Stream& lhs, const Stream& rhs) {
28 return lhs.index == rhs.index;
29}
30
31inline bool operator!=(const Stream& lhs, const Stream& rhs) {
32 return !(lhs == rhs);
33}
